resources.string:
Technical School N°7 IMPA


 Meet the technical school N°7 and learn about it

Welcome to Tour Gen-Boost. 
Tour Gen-Boost was thought as the final project in order to obtain our technician title, it was developed by Technical School N°7 students (IMPA) 
Our goal was to facilitate and give freedom to any person interested in touring any facility, giving a technological guide and brief explanations for his interest.
 Involved students:
 Franco Smuraglia 
 Enzo Cerochi 
 Diego Torres 
 Joaquín Figueroa 
 Lautaro marchegiani

Follow the instructions: 

 Get the glasses 
 Put the cell phone into the glasses 
 Get a remote control 
 Connect the remote control to the 
 application by Bluetooth 
 Go to the starting point of the tour 
 Put the glasses on 
 Start the tour
You selected the tour: \n\n Technical School N°7 IMPA
